suppress.notes: Refers to a Groovy LDAP class which is not in use in this application

Has to do with weak permissions on a config file in default installations of tomcat on linux system. Not related to usage of tomcat within this application. Note also that the packaged tomcat dependencies are not used at all when the application is deployed into an external tomcat installation.
Applies to spring framework versions 4.3.0 - 4.3.4, which are not in use in this application
